headline: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Is Up 17.5% After Strong Q3 And NVIDIA-Powered Inference Cloud Launch – Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Akamai Technologies recently reported strong Q3 2025 results, highlighting faster Cloud Infrastructure Services growth, resilient security revenue, and guidance for full-year 2025 adjusted EPS of US$6.93–US$7.13. The company also introduced its NVIDIA-powered Akamai Inference Cloud for AI at the edge, underscoring management’s focus on expanding higher-value AI and cloud infrastructure offerings. We’ll now examine how Akamai’s upbeat guidance and launch of its NVIDIA-powered Inference Cloud...

headline: Akamai Inference Cloud Ties Edge AI Push To Security Growth
summary: Akamai Technologies (NasdaqGS:AKAM) launched its NVIDIA powered Akamai Inference Cloud, targeting AI workloads at the edge. The company paired this product launch with strong quarterly results and growth in its cloud services and security businesses. The new offering is designed to run AI inference closer to end users across Akamai's distributed network. Akamai comes into this AI focused move with its shares at $111.76 and a track record of positive returns, including 17.5% over the past...
